body: This happens after 306517 · · ─────── ·𖥸· ─────── · · 1st page: he tells Tachibana he has something important to say, then she teases him and asks if he’s going confess “like the virgin he is”· · ─────── ·𖥸· ─────── · · 2nd page: “What do you think you’re doing to me Senpai (前辈)? “To think you’d bring me here… doing something like this to your kohai (后辈)!”· · ─────── ·𖥸· ─────── · · 3rd page: “So damn noisy, could you quiet down!” “Because of your arrogance, I’m going to do this to you everyday!” Senpai says this because he’s fed up with Tachibana calling him a virgin… which is funny because they lost their virginities to each other. · · ─────── ·𖥸· ─────── · · 4th page: “Senpai… will you really bring me here everyday?”· · ─────── ·𖥸· ─────── · · Yatta to my favourite doujin getting an after!
That bitch gained what she deserves
